intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: At MADFAM ("we", "our" or "the company"), we value and respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information when you use our website and services.

providedInfo.title: 2.1 Information you provide us
items: Full name and contact details (email, phone)
Company information (name, industry, size)
Details about your needs and projects
Communications you have with us

automaticInfo.title: 2.2 Information collected automatically
items: IP address and approximate location
Browser type and device
Pages visited and time spent
Referral source (how you reached our site)

dataUse.title: 3. Use of Information
items: Provide and improve our services
Communicate with you about projects and opportunities
Personalize your experience on our site
Send you relevant information about our services (with your consent)
Comply with legal and contractual obligations
Analyze and improve our business processes

dataSharing.title: 4. Sharing Information
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties, except in the following cases:
items: With your explicit consent
To comply with legal obligations
With service providers that help us operate our business
In case of merger, acquisition or sale of assets

dataSecurity.title: 5. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your information:
items: SSL/TLS encryption for all data transmissions
Restricted access to personal information
Continuous security monitoring
Regular security updates

cookies.title: 6. Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.description: We use cookies and similar technologies to:
items: Maintain your preferences
Analyze site traffic (via Plausible Analytics)
Improve site functionality
cookies.note: You can configure your browser to reject cookies, although this may affect site functionality.

userRights.title: 7. Your Rights
items: Access your personal information
Correct inaccurate information
Request deletion of your information
Object to processing of your data
Receive your data in portable format
Withdraw your consent at any time

dataRetention.title: 8. Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires or permits a longer retention period.

minors.title: 9. Minors
minors.content: Our services are not directed to persons under 18 years of age. We do not knowingly collect information from minors.

changes.title: 10. Changes to this Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy occasionally. We will notify you of significant changes by posting the new policy on our website.

contact.title: 11. Contact
contact.description: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your information, contact us:

authority.title: 12. Data Protection Authority
authority.content: If you are not satisfied with our response to your concerns, you have the right to file a complaint with the National Institute of Transparency, Access to Information and Protection of Personal Data (INAI).

terms.disclaimer: This document has been simplified to demonstrate internationalization. The complete version will be available soon.

acceptance.content: By accessing and using MADFAM's services ("we", "our" or "the company"), you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you disagree with any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

services.title: 2. Description of Services
services.description: MADFAM provides technology consulting services, 3D design, software development, platform implementation and strategic digital transformation services, including but not limited to:
items: 3D design and graphic services (Level 1 - Essentials)
Parametric design and interactive experiences (Level 2 - Advanced)
Consulting and training (Level 3 - Consulting)
AI and automation platform implementation (Level 4 - Platforms)
Virtual CTO services (Level 5 - Strategic)

license.content: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our website for informational purposes and to contract our services.

ourContent.content: All site content, including text, graphics, logos, images and software, is owned by MADFAM or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws.

yourContent.content: You retain all rights to content you provide us. By sharing content with us, you grant us a license to use it in providing our services.

fees.content: Fees for our services are established based on the scope and complexity of each project. All quotes are valid for 30 days unless otherwise specified.

payment.title: 5.2 Payment Methods
payment.content: We accept bank transfers, credit cards, and other payment methods agreed upon in advance. Invoices are payable within 30 days of issue unless otherwise agreed.

lateFees.content: Late payments may incur interest charges at the rate of 1.5% per month or the maximum rate permitted by law, whichever is lower.

disclaimer.title: 6.1 Service Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Our services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, either express or implied, except as required by law.

limitation.content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, MADFAM's total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific services that gave rise to the claim.

exclusions.content: We are not liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including loss of profits, data, or business opportunities.

userIndemnity.content: You agree to indemnify and hold MADFAM harmless from any claims, losses, or damages arising from your use of our services or violation of these terms.

mutualIndemnity.title: 7.2 Mutual Protection
mutualIndemnity.content: Each party agrees to defend the other against third-party claims arising from their own negligence or willful misconduct.

byUser.title: 8.1 Termination by You
byUser.content: You may terminate your use of our services at any time by providing written notice and settling any outstanding obligations.

byUs.title: 8.2 Termination by MADFAM
byUs.content: We may terminate or suspend services immediately if you breach these terms or engage in conduct harmful to our business or other users.

effects.content: Upon termination, all licenses granted to you will cease, and you must return or destroy any confidential information in your possession.

jurisdiction.content: These terms are governed by the laws of Mexico, without regard to conflict of law principles.

arbitration.content: If negotiation fails, disputes shall be resolved through binding arbitration under the rules of the Mexican Arbitration Center.

severability.content: If any provision is found invalid, the remaining provisions will continue in full force and effect.
